intro: Here you can find clear, trusted, shareable information to make informed decisions around COVID, as well as essential resources that will help you understand, interpret, and apply Covid Act Now’s data.
metadataDescription: Find recent and trusted information & resources about the novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV). Learn about Symptoms, Tests, Risks, and more. Backed by medical experts. Make informed decisions to stop the disease for you and your community.

sections.description: Learn about the five key metrics Covid Act Now uses to assess COVID across U.S. states, metros, and counties.
If you’d like to stay on top of COVID without visiting our site, sign up for alerts or subscribe to our free newsletters.
Get the facts about how COVID is spread, how to prevent transmission, and the latest on treatments and vaccines from these articles, written by scientists, researchers and public health experts.
R₀ vs R(t) vs Infection rate. Here you can find clear definitions of the vocabulary being used to talk about COVID.
"When can I get a vaccine?" to "how soon after possible exposure to COVID should I get tested?" Here are answers to some of the top COVID questions.

Learn about how leaders in industry, public health, and government are using Covid Act Now’s data and tools in their strategic and day-to-day response to the pandemic to make better decisions to combat COVID.
Explore recent developments — including new tools and simple instructions on how to use them — at Covid Act Now.
